item.title: ‘South Park’ Takes on Trump in Season 27 Premiere as Creators Ink $1.5 Billion Deal
item.description: The long-running satire returns after a nearly 2.5-year hiatus and as a battle over its future has just concluded.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Takes on Trump in Season 27 Premiere as Creators Ink $1.5 Billion Deal
item.description: The long-running satire returns after a nearly 2.5-year hiatus and as a battle over its future has just concluded.

item.title: Paramount and Hybe’s K-pop Movie Adds Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam, Lands 2027 Release
item.description: Benson Lee will direct the film, which is expected to be the first major American studio film shot entirely in South Korea.

item.title: Paramount and Hybe’s K-pop Movie Adds Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam, Lands 2027 Release
item.description: Benson Lee will direct the film, which is expected to be the first major American studio film shot entirely in South Korea.

item.title: Stephen Colbert’s Famous Friends Make Cameos on ‘The Late Show’ to Help Cheer Up Audience After Cancellation
item.description: Adam Sandler, Anderson Cooper, Jon Stewart and Jimmy Fallon were among those who made surprise appearances on Monday’s episode after CBS announced that the late-night show would be ending in May 2026.

item.title: Stephen Colbert’s Famous Friends Make Cameos on ‘The Late Show’ to Help Cheer Up Audience After Cancellation
item.description: Adam Sandler, Anderson Cooper, Jon Stewart and Jimmy Fallon were among those who made surprise appearances on Monday’s episode after CBS announced that the late-night show would be ending in May 2026.

item.title: Jon Stewart Slams CBS For Colbert Cancellation: “You Are F***ing Wrong”
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host breaks silence on his friend and former colleague’s ‘The Late Show’ getting axed and leads the audience in a “go f*** yourself” chant against companies bending the knee to Trump.

item.title: Jon Stewart Slams CBS For Colbert Cancellation: “You Are F***ing Wrong”
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host breaks silence on his friend and former colleague’s ‘The Late Show’ getting axed and leads the audience in a “go f*** yourself” chant against companies bending the knee to Trump.

item.title: Jon Stewart Is Unsure of ‘The Daily Show’s Future Amid Paramount-Skydance Merger
item.description: ‘The Daily Show’ host’s comments came shortly before it was announced that CBS has canceled ‘The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.’

item.title: ‘Late Show’ Shocker: CBS Ending Late-Night Franchise in 2026
item.description: Host Stephen Colbert announced the news during the taping of Thursday’s show.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Removed From Paramount+ Outside the U.S.
item.description: Amid a streaming rights battle, the platform’s license to stream the series internationally has expired, sources tell The Hollywood Reporter.
